sentences.sContent: The taxi driver, a phlegmatic man in middle age, showed no surprise at this request.
sentences.sCn: 出租车司机是个冷静的中年人，对这一要求毫不惊讶。

remMethod.val: 来自phlegm(痰)， 西方人认为痰多的人不易动感情

trans.tranCn: 冷淡的， 不动感情的
trans.tranOther: Someone who is phlegmatic stays calm even when upsetting or exciting things happen
